sentences.en: Basically ultrasonic vibrations are used to dislodge both plaque and tartar from the tooth surface.
sentences.cn: 医生只要开动超声波工作手机使之接触牙石,牙石就会自动脱落.

sentences.en: Chest percussion and vibration are used with postural drainage to help dislodge secretions.
sentences.cn: 在做体位引流时要敲击和振动胸部帮助分泌物松动排出.

sentences.en: Do not attempt to dislodge food when the appliance is plugged into electrical outlet.
sentences.cn: 设备在通电状态下请不要试图将食物从设备中取出.

sentences.en: He could not dislodge the images imprinted on his brain.
sentences.cn: 他难以把刻在脑海中的形象抹去。

sentences.en: He may challenge the Prime Minister even if he decides he cannot dislodge her this time.
sentences.cn: 尽管他认为他这次并不能把首相赶下台，但他可能还是要向她挑战。

sentences.en: Heavy gunfire dislodge the rebels from the jungle.
sentences.cn: 重重的炮火把那些叛徒从丛林移除.

sentences.en: Heavy rain or hail may dislodge many aphids from the plants.
sentences.cn: 大雨和冰雹可从植株上击落很多蚜虫.

sentences.en: Ian dislodged a few stones as he climbed up the rock.
sentences.cn: 伊恩攀岩的时候敲掉了几块石头。

sentences.en: Knock the mould against the table to dislodge the mooncake.
sentences.cn: 把模子往桌上敲,来移动月饼.

sentences.en: No one could dislodge them from their well - en - trenched positions.
sentences.cn: 没人能把他们从防守严密的地方逐出.

sentences.en: Once expectations converge on an inefficient norm, it can be very difficult to dislodge.
sentences.cn: 一旦经验聚集在无效的规范上, 改正它将是非常困难.

sentences.en: She did not so easily dislodge the incident from her consideration.
sentences.cn: 她却没那么容易就把这件事从她的思想里驱走.

sentences.en: The bouncing grains strike the ground, either bouncing into the air again or dislodge other grains.
sentences.cn: 跳动着的粒子冲击地面, 它或者重新进入大气,或者撞击另一些粒子.

sentences.en: the revolution that failed to dislodge the British in 1919
sentences.cn: 未能推翻英国统治的1919年革命

sentences.en: The thorn of bone may dislodge from his throat without surgery.
sentences.cn: 也许不用动手术就能去除他喉咙卡着的那块骨刺.

sentences.en: There's something between my teeth and I can't dislodge it.
sentences.cn: 我牙缝里塞了点东西,就是弄不出来.

sentences.en: This will dislodge any fibers that may be in a vertical positions in the perforations.
sentences.cn: 这可洗掉孔眼上方垂直方向的任何纤维.

words.tran_cn: 逐出，驱逐；使……移动；用力移动

trans.tran_cn: 逐出，驱逐；使……移动；用力移动
trans.tran_en: to make someone leave a place or lose a position of power
